message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $11,000. This still gives you a great value for the product, and it's a fair price for me. Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,800?

Bob, I'm open to finding a compromise, but $10,800 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,900. This is a fair price for both of us, and it allows us to close the deal. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,900, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,750?

Bob, I'm starting to think we're not going to be able to reach an agreement. I'm willing to come down to $10,850, but I can't go any lower than that. If you're not interested, I'm going to have to move on to another buyer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,850, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,700?
